    • Uses of ChessModel in controller.pieces

      Methods in controller.pieces with parameters of type ChessModel 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Chessman.is_stalemate(ChessModel model) 
      void Chessman.jump(int x, int y, int x1, int y1, ChessModel model) 
      boolean King.king_check_control(int i, int j, Teams color, ChessModel model) 
      boolean Pawn.mkMove(int ax, int ay, int bx, int by, ChessModel model)
      If move is from one tile to another on diagonal, check if there is another chessman
      else check move is one tile forward
      boolean EmptyMan.mkMove(int ax, int ay, int bx, int by, ChessModel model) 
      boolean King.mkMove(int ax, int ay, int bx, int by, ChessModel model)
      This method checks that the move proposal is only one tile and if the move does not procure a chessmate.
      boolean Queen.mkMove(int ax, int ay, int bx, int by, ChessModel model) 
      abstract boolean Chessman.mkMove(int ax, int ay, int bx, int by, ChessModel model)
      This method checks if a move is legal.
      boolean Rook.mkMove(int ax, int ay, int bx, int by, ChessModel model) 
      boolean Bishop.mkMove(int ax, int ay, int bx, int by, ChessModel model)
      check if the coordinates are on the same diagonal: if it's false the move is impossible; if it's true check if there are any chessmen on the diagonal: if there is a chessman with same color the move is impossible; if there is a chessman with different color jump the enemy chessman; if there is a chessman which belongs to the team empty the move is possible.
      boolean Knight.mkMove(int ax, int ay, int bx, int by, ChessModel model)
      check if the move is L-shape if it's false the move is impossible; if it's true check if there is any chessmen in the destination: if there is a chessman with same color the move is impossible; if there is a chessman with different color jump the enemy chessman; if there is a chessman belongs to the team empty the move is possible.
      void Chessman.movement(int ax, int ay, int bx, int by, ChessModel model)
      This method performs the actual move, swapping the two chessmen.
